verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> that time <S%G2540><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of the fame <S%G189><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to his servants, <S%G3816><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> he is risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%> and therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> mighty <S%G1411><s%> works do show <S%G1754><s%> forth <S%G1754><s%> themselves in him.

For Herod <S%G2264><s%> had laid hold <S%G2902><s%> on John, <S%G2491><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> him, and put <S%G5087><s%> him in prison <S%G5438><s%> for Herodias' <S%G2266><s%> sake, his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip's <S%G5376><s%> wife. <S%G1135><s%>
For John <S%G2491><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, It is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for you to have <S%G2192><s%> her.

And when he would <S%G2309><s%> have put <S%G615><s%> him to death, <S%G615><s%> he feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they counted <S%G2192><s%> him as a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

But when Herod's <S%G2264><s%> birthday <S%G1077><s%> was kept, <S%G71><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> danced <S%G3738><s%> before <S%G3319><s%> them, and pleased <S%G700><s%> Herod. <S%G2264><s%>
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> he promised <S%G3670><s%> with an oath <S%G3727><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> her whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> she would ask. <S%G154><s%>

And she, being before <S%G4264><s%> instructed <S%G4264><s%> of her mother, <S%G3384><s%> said, <S%G5346><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> me here <S%G5602><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Baptist's <S%G910><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> in a charger. <S%G4094><s%>

And the king <S%G935><s%> was sorry: <S%G3076><s%> nevertheless for the oath's <S%G3727><s%> sake, and them which sat <S%G4873><s%> with him at <S%G4873><s%> meat, he commanded <S%G2753><s%> it to be given <S%G1325><s%> her.
And he sent, <S%G3992><s%> and beheaded <S%G607><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in the prison. <S%G5438><s%>
And his head <S%G2776><s%> was brought <S%G5342><s%> in a charger, <S%G4094><s%> and given <S%G1325><s%> to the damsel: <S%G2877><s%> and she brought <S%G5342><s%> it to her mother. <S%G3384><s%>
And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> up the body, <S%G4983><s%> and buried <S%G2290><s%> it, and went <S%G2064><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of it, he departed <S%G402><s%> there <S%G1564><s%> by ship <S%G4143><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a desert <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> apart: <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> and when the people <S%G3793><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> thereof, they followed <S%G190><s%> him on <S%G3979><s%> foot <S%G3979><s%> out of the cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and was moved <S%G4697><s%> with compassion <S%G4697><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> them, and he healed <S%G2323><s%> their sick. <S%G732><s%>

And when it was evening, <S%G3798><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3588><s%> is a desert <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and the time <S%G5610><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> past; <S%G3928><s%> send <S%G630><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> that they may go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the villages, <S%G2968><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> victuals. <S%G1033><s%>
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, They need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not depart; <S%G565><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you them to eat. <S%G5315><s%>
And they say <S%G3004><s%> to him, We have <S%G2192><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> but five <S%G4002><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> fishes. <S%G2486><s%>
He said, <S%G2036><s%> Bring <S%G5342><s%> them here <S%G5602><s%> to me.

And he commanded <S%G2753><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit <S%G347><s%> down <S%G347><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the grass, <S%G5528><s%> and took <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> fishes, <S%G2486><s%> and looking <S%G308><s%> up to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he blessed, <S%G2127><s%> and broke, <S%G2806><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> the loaves <S%G740><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

And they did all <S%G3956><s%> eat, <S%G5315><s%> and were filled: <S%G5526><s%> and they took <S%G142><s%> up of the fragments <S%G2801><s%> that remained <S%G4052><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full. <S%G4134><s%>
And they that had eaten <S%G2068><s%> were about <S%G5616><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand <S%G4000><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> beside <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and children. <S%G3813><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> constrained <S%G315><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> to get <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> and to go <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> him to the other <S%G4008><s%> side, <S%G4008><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> he sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away. <S%G630><s%>

And when he had sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> he went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> apart <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> to pray: <S%G4336><s%> and when the evening <S%G3798><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> he was there <S%G1563><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>

But the ship <S%G4143><s%> was now <S%G2235><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> tossed <S%G928><s%> with waves: <S%G2949><s%> for the wind <S%G417><s%> was contrary. <S%G1727><s%>
And in the fourth <S%G5067><s%> watch <S%G5438><s%> of the night <S%G3571><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G565><s%> to them, walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And when the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> they were troubled, <S%G5015><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is a spirit; <S%G5326><s%> and they cried <S%G2896><s%> out for fear. <S%G5401><s%>
But straightway <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Be of good cheer; <S%G2293><s%> it is I; be not afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it be you, bid <S%G2753><s%> me come <S%G2064><s%> to you on <S%G1909><s%> the water. <S%G5204><s%>

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%> And when Peter <S%G4074><s%> was come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of the ship, <S%G4143><s%> he walked <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the water, <S%G5204><s%> to go <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

But when he saw <S%G991><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> boisterous, <S%G2478><s%> he was afraid; <S%G5399><s%> and beginning <S%G756><s%> to sink, <S%G2670><s%> he cried, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> me.

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stretched <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and caught <S%G1949><s%> him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, O you of little <S%G3640><s%> faith, <S%G3640><s%> why <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you doubt? <S%G1365><s%>
And when they were come <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ship, <S%G4143><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> ceased. <S%G2869><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> they that were in the ship <S%G4143><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Of a truth <S%G230><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when they were gone <S%G1276><s%> over, <S%G1276><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Gennesaret. <S%G1082><s%>

And when the men <S%G435><s%> of that place <S%G5117><s%> had knowledge <S%G1921><s%> of him, they sent <S%G649><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> that country <S%G4066><s%> round <S%G4066><s%> about, <S%G4066><s%> and brought <S%G4374><s%> to him all <S%G3956><s%> that were diseased; <S%G2560><s%>

And sought <S%G3870><s%> him that they might only <S%G3440><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> the hem <S%G2899><s%> of his garment: <S%G2440><s%> and as many <S%G3745><s%> as touched <S%G680><s%> were made <S%G1295><s%> perfectly <S%G1295><s%> whole. <S%G1295><s%>
